CustomField.description: Does any of child has cancer ?
CustomField.formula: IF( Child_1_Has_Cancer__c, 'Yes', IF( Child_2_Has_Cancer__c, 'Yes', IF( Child_3_Has_Cancer__c, 'Yes', IF( Child_4_Has_Cancer__c, 'Yes', 'No' ) ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Does any of child has cancer ?
CustomField.label: Has Cancer
